item.title: $ ext{ID}^3$: Identity-Preserving-yet-Diversified Diffusion Models for Synthetic Face Recognition
item.description: IDÂ³: A novel diffusion model generates diverse, identity-preserving synthetic face datasets for accurate and privacy-preserving face recognition, exceeding current state-of-the-art methods.

item.description: e-Softmax: A simple plug-and-play module enhances deep learning model robustness against noisy labels by approximating one-hot vectors, achieving noise-tolerant learning with controllable excess risk.

item.description: SE(3)-equivariant ray embeddings in Perceiver IO achieve state-of-the-art implicit multi-view depth estimation, surpassing methods that rely on data augmentation for approximate equivariance.

item.description: This paper introduces mSSRM-PGA, achieving globally optimal m-sparse Sharpe ratios, addressing the nonconvexity issue in portfolio optimization through a novel proximal gradient algorithm.

item.description: Recommender systems, when influenced by both users and creators, inevitably polarize; however, prioritizing efficiency through methods like top-k truncation can surprisingly enhance diversity.

item.title: Verified Code Transpilation with LLMs
item.description: LLMLIFT: An LLM-powered approach builds verified lifting tools for DSLs, outperforming prior symbolic methods in benchmark transpilation and requiring less development effort.

item.title: Video Token Merging for Long Video Understanding
item.description: Researchers boost long-form video understanding efficiency by 6.89x and reduce memory usage by 84% using a novel learnable video token merging algorithm.

item.title: Vision-Language Navigation with Energy-Based Policy
item.description: Energy-based Navigation Policy (ENP) revolutionizes Vision-Language Navigation by modeling joint state-action distributions, achieving superior performance across diverse benchmarks.

item.title: VisionLLM v2: An End-to-End Generalist Multimodal Large Language Model for Hundreds of Vision-Language Tasks
item.description: VisionLLM v2 unifies visual perception, understanding, and generation, excelling in various vision tasks and achieving performance comparable to task-specific models.

item.description: Align LLMs efficiently via test-time search using smaller models!

item.title: Weight decay induces low-rank attention layers
item.description: Weight decay in deep learning surprisingly induces low-rank attention layers, potentially harming performance but offering optimization strategies for large language models.

item.title: What matters when building vision-language models?
item.description: Idefics2, a new 8B-parameter VLM, achieves state-of-the-art performance, closing the gap with much larger models by meticulously analyzing design choices and training methods.

item.title: What Variables Affect Out-of-Distribution Generalization in Pretrained Models?
item.description: High-resolution datasets with diverse classes significantly improve the transferability of pretrained DNNs by reducing representation compression and mitigating the ’tunnel effect.'

item.title: Zipfian Whitening
item.description: Zipfian Whitening: Weighting PCA whitening by word frequency dramatically improves NLP task performance, surpassing established baselines and providing a theoretical framework for existing methods.
